title: Festival Polskiej 1967
description: Black poster with man's yelling face in red bars at right. Text in right to left of face, in bottom left quadrant reads: "FESTIWAL/ POLSKIEJ/ POEZJI/ WSPOLCZESNEJ/ im. WLADYSLAWA/ BRONIEWSKIEGO/ PLOCK 10-11 LUTY/ 1967" in red.
